name: iCam
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my camera
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Adding a camera
·Create an iCam365 App account if you don’t have one.
·Devices are listed under the iCam365 App account. If no device is found, add your device to the account.
·Search for "iCam" in the Alexa App and bind the account, then you can have access to the devices under the account. The device will be available to you within 45 seconds.
Once you’ve completed those steps, you can watch the live video in two ways:
1.Click a camera to play the live video automatically.
2.If you have a camera named "office", you can say "Alexa, open office camera" anytime.
